renderpass.code:
#define SS(l,r,t) smoothstep(l,r,t)
#define L(t) length(t)

void mainImage( out vec4 O, in vec2 F )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 5.*(2.*F - R.xy)/R.y,
         Ug = 10.*F/R,
         K = vec2(1., 1.73),
         H = K*.5,
         G0 = mod(U,K)-H,
         G1 = mod(U-H,K)-H,
         G = L(G0)<L(G1)?G0:G1,
         id=(U-G);
    float d = .5-max(dot(abs(G),vec2(cos(1.047),sin(1.047))),abs(G.x)),
          e = SS(.0125,.0225,d),
          r = texture(iChannel0,id*123.45).r,
          m = texture(iChannel1, U*.1).r,
          t = 1.5*(.5+.5*sin(iTime*.5)),
          f = (e-1.+r*.075)+max(.125,t)*SS(10.,-10.,L(U))+SS(3.85,max(.125,1.75*sin(iTime*.5)),dot(U,U))*(SS(.15, -.05, d)+1.35*SS(1.,-.1,(d-.01)/fwidth(d)));

    O = vec4(pow(mix(vec3(m), f*vec3(1.,.4,.1), .995), vec3(1./1.55)),1);
}
renderpass.name: Image
